name: coMMand's G15 winampApplet
short_description: coMMands G15 winampPlugin is a tool which allows you to control winamp with a Logitech G15 gaming keyboard. The control has been developed for gamers who do not want to leave a fullscreenapplication or use hotkeys to control winamp. Playlistview included
